```{r}
dataframe <- read.csv("IRPdata.csv")[-c(2, 71),18:71]
```

```{r}
df <- dataframe[dataframe$Q1.5 == "Yes, I do",]
table(df$Q2)
df$Q2[df$Q2 == "Female"] <- 0
df$Q2[df$Q2 == "Male"] <- 1
df$Q2[df$Q2 == "Non-binary / third gender"] <- 2
df$Q2[df$Q2 == "Prefer not to say"] <- 3
```
